goalkeeper.name: Marc-André ter Stegen
goalkeeper.info: Marc-André ter Stegen joined FC Barcelona in 2014. Known for his excellent reflexes and ball-playing abilities, he has been a crucial part of the team.

goalkeeper.name: Iñaki Peña
goalkeeper.info: Ignacio Peña Sotorres, also known as Iñaki Peña, is a promising young goalkeeper who has been part of FC Barcelona since his youth.
